nonterminals.xvalue: ( word | xdata | string | xstring | array | xarray | map | xmap )

specials.LINE+: Generated when a non-empty line starts with deeper indentation than the previous line.
specials.LINE=: Generated when a non-empty line starts with the same indentation as the previous line.
specials.LINE-: Generated when a non-empty line starts with shallower indentation than the previous line. One token is generated for each level outdented, or an error if the indentation does not match a previous level.
